tier.item: (4) a. Molte vittime sarebbero riconosciute dalle famiglie. ITALIAN
`Many victims would be recognized by their families.' (Verbal Passive)
(4) a. Molte vittime sarebbero riconosciute dalle famiglie. ITALIAN
`Many victims would be recognized by their families.' (Verbal Passive)
Molte vittime sarebbero riconosciute dalle famiglie.
Many victims would be recognized by their families.
Many of them would be recognized.
(5) a. Molte vittime sarebbero sconosciute alle autorità. ITALIAN
`Many victims would be unknown to the families.' (Adjectival Passive)

Many of them would be unknown.

the-present place-PASS to.me inside a.box (Verbal Passive)

(7) a. *Nei sono buoni [pochi ei ] (dei suoi articoli). ITALIAN
of-them are good few (of his articles) (simple adjectives)

mother my she make me.ACC cook food for them
`It's my mother that made me cook food for them.'
